text:
[Vroom/develop] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/vroom/commits/4a0331540cc888081b855244b5ddfeb577fa2bd9|4a0331540cc8>: VROOM-311 Updated picasso. Loading smaller images when selected from the gallery. Added error dialogs for File and OOM errors. Showing progress spinner sooner to seem more responsive.
 - Katarina Mitchell
